Pluto front-end is written in javascript, there's no way to not run a browser. (many editors such as Atom/VSCode nowadays also run on web stack).

Also the Slack you're using rn runs on web stack too, either in browser or locally on top of Electron (basically a JS app engine based on Chromium, so you're running browser either way

text:
someone can write a lighter browser (there are many already), but it has nothing to do with Pluto, Pluto just serves HTML+JS, what "browser" you're using is entirely up to you.

But no matter how light it is, you will be running a browser, Ultralight uses WebKit, which is what runs behind browser such as Safari
